item.title: timing
item.description: 17:50 Sunday 29 October 2017 JST I donâ€™t know why all this shit is piling up and the timing got fucked up so I lost 2 hours today. Lin is fighting with her family because they are doing shit that reminds her of old shit. I am supposed to be doing shit for work but cannot concentrate with her being so loud talking to her family about how crazy her family is.

item.title: good i-group
holy shit what a morning
item.description: 09:13 Tuesday 06 June 2017 JST Lin cooked lovely breakfast for me, by cooking an egg into some already-made vegetable soup. The soup was too hot to eat immediately (because it had just been boiling), and it reminded me of all the times she has reheated food to scalding temperature. From my point of view, the food is already cooked; there is no reason to reheat it at all, much less beyond the point that it can be eaten.
